message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, even at that price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $9,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement closer to my offer.
